data.name: Cast
data.detailed_description:
Have you ever seen the shadow of an actor? I am sure it will not be more interesting than the performance itself. But in this game, you need to control the actor's shadow, a black ball, to complete each performance. Move the shadow to make your character reach the end! This seemingly simple task is also full of challenges: Although the character is unobstructed in the space, the shadow of the character will be subject to various restrictions on the three two-dimensional planes. Maybe you need to switch the current projected plane from time to time to break through the walls and spikes.

Unprecedented game experience: a decryption game combined with platform jumping does not seem to cause any uproar, but the idea of using the relationship of spatial projection to instantly cross the mechanism is rarely seen.

Colorful scene elements: lasers, spikes, portal and "entities" that we may need to spend a lot of time introducing are all part of your performance. Making good use of the tab key may prevent your shadow from faltering.

Eclectic map editor: use your excellent talent and unique insight into various obstacles to create your own script. You can also share these levels with us. Let's see what you can do!

data.short_description: Applauding, the cast is ready. Lighting, the shadow is sneaky. Tabing, the final is blurry. Ending, the future is dizzy.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.60GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
